title: Healing Time
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>Splendid work, Maki-san. It was wonderful.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>So you came, Dia!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yes, I’ve been looking forward to your piano concert for quite some time. The second piece especially sounded so lovely and soothing to the heart.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I’m glad. The second piece is one of my favorites too. I’m relieved to hear you say that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yeah. It was like the troubles I face daily just got cleansed away....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>The mess of paperwork that Mari-san did in the student council room yesterday, and the preparation for an event happening next weekend that Chika-san suddenly brought up....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>That.... must’ve been quite the trouble, huh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Hey, if you have time, would you like to go for some tea after this? We haven’t met in a while, so I’d love to hear all about them. I’m sure you’ll feel better if you talk those troubles out with someone.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>May I!? I’ll take you up on that! I found a cafe near the venue earlier that specializes in apple pie.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Then it’s decided, okay. Wait for a bit, I’ll go get changed!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
